name: Cobra vs Viper
description:
In the Animal Kingdom life is difficult for most creatures, having to suffer as another's meal. Predators hunt Prey, but what happens when two Predators clash for dominance or for something as simple as a meal. Take control of two reptiles fighting over their next meal, who will be victorious? The Mighty Cobra or the Fearsome Viper only time will tell which Predator emerges VICTORIOUS!!! How to Play

There are two species of snake that the players can take control of, one using the mouse and the other using the W,A,S,D keys. The goal is to eat as much Prey as possible. If you hit any of the barriers or edges you lose.
